title: Looking for Labor Day tool deals? Here's how you can save.
description: Shop Amazon’s Labor Day sale for more than 50% off power tools and DIY tools. Get home improvement deals on shop vacs, drills, lifting devices, more.
content:
• Shoppers can find unique discounts on items like lifting devices and endoscope cameras.

Whether you're tackling a weekend renovation or just refreshing your toolkit, Amazon’s Labor Day sale is packed with deep discounts on DIY and home improvement essentials.

With markdowns of more than 50% off, now’s the time to grab that cool power tool you’ve been eyeing or stock up on supplies for the growing list of fall home improvement projects I know you have (same, and I feel your pain).

From paint sprayers that I personally recommend and top-rated DeWalt wet-dry shop vacs to impact drivers and ratchet sets, here are some of the best Labor Day tool deals to shop at Amazon's sale right now.

These deals won’t last long. Save on popular power tools, as well as some surprising discounts on home improvement hacks like a lifting device to make moving heavy items easier and an endoscope camera so you can take a look at small, hidden spaces. Head to Amazon to shop the full Labor Day tool sale and get your DIY plans rolling!
• 64% off: Surge Protector Power Strip, 10-Foot Flat Plug Extension Cord with 8 Widely Outlets and 4 USB Ports
• Save up to $300: 10 Labor Day lawn mower deals you can't pass up

Why should you shop Amazon's Labor Day tool deals?

Labor Day weekend is one of the best times of year to score deals on tools and hardware. With prices this low—and free shipping for Prime members—it’s a smart time to invest in your next project.

Do I need to be an Amazon Prime member to shop Amazon's Labor Day sale?

No, you do not need to be an Amazon Prime member to shop the best Amazon Labor Day deals. But, joining Prime helps guarantee you get access to other perks like fast shipping all year long, access to Prime Video, Prime Reading, Prime Gaming and more.

How much does an Amazon Prime membership cost?

New members can try one week of Amazon Prime benefits for just $1.99. After that, Prime costs $14.99 per month or $139 per year.

USA TODAY Shopping will be covering all the best Labor Day 2025 sales, so be sure tosign up for text alerts,sign up for our newsletter andfollow us on Instagram to stay updated!
summary: Amazon's Labor Day sale is offering discounts on DIY and home improvement essentials, with markdowns of over 50% off. Discounts include unique discounts on items such as lifting devices and endoscope cameras. The sale is not limited to Amazon Prime members, but membership benefits include fast shipping, access to Prime Video, Prime Reading, Prime Gaming and more.
shortSummary: Amazon's Labor Day sale offers extensive discounts on popular power tools and DIY tools, including unique discounts on unique home improvement hacks, with Prime membership available for sale.

When is the Amazon Labor Day sale?
Amazon's 2025 Labor Day sale kicks off on Friday, August 22. The sale will run through Labor Day proper with new deals dropping daily.
Do I need to be an Amazon Prime member to shop Amazon's Labor Day sale?
No, you do not need to be an Amazon Prime member to access the best Labor Day deals. But, joining Prime helps guarantee you get other perks like fast shipping all year long, access to Prime Video, Prime Reading, Prime Gaming and more.
How much does an Amazon Prime membership cost?
New members can try one week of Amazon Prime benefits for just $1.99. After that, Prime costs $14.99 per month or $139 per year.

From mirrors to viral juice glasses: 10 Anthropologie Labor Day deals worth buying 💫
Save up to 40% on whimsical fashion, cult-favorite home decor, fall candles and you can even get your hands on the Anthro Advent Calendar!
Anthropologie's website probably loves to see me coming (read: scrolling)—especially if I've got a credit card handy and an itch to shop. Such is the case this week, as the internet-loved brand just launched its massive Labor Day sale, which features deals of up to 40% off on sale items and home essentials, as well as a 25% off discount on designer denim finds.
The bottom line: Seemingly everything is on sale at Anthropologie right now, and in true deal-hunter fashion, I can't stop browsing.
From discounted viral juice glasses and rustic mirrors to new fall arrivals like aromatic pumpkin candles and faux-leather moto jackets, there's something for everyone to shop and save on.
Shop viral Anthropologie Labor Day deals for up to 40% off sale and home essentials

When is Labor Day 2025?
This year, Labor Day falls on Monday, September 1. Anthropologie is offering Labor Day deals now through next Monday.
More Anthropologie Labor Day deals
How does Labor Day compare to other shopping holidays?
Labor Day rivals Black Friday for big-ticket savings, especially on home goods, mattresses and appliances. It’s also a key moment for back-to-school and seasonal transitions.

Discover the top end-of-summer discounts on hybrid, memory foam and adjustable mattresses.
If you're shopping for a new mattress, Labor Day is one of the best times of the year to score serious savings ahead of the holiday season.
Right now, you can find deep discounts on top-rated mattress brands like Tempur-Pedic, Casper, Saatva, Awara and more—making it the perfect moment to upgrade your sleep setup without overspending.
Whether you're eyeing a luxury Saatva mattress with free white glove delivery for your primary bedroom or a budget-friendly Nectar mattress-in-a-box for your guest room, the USA TODAY Shopping team has rounded up the best Labor Day mattress sales to help you save up to 72% before fall hits.

Why shop Labor Day mattress sales?
- Major savings: Many brands offer their biggest discounts of the year ahead of and during Labor Day weekend.
- Free perks: Look for extras like free delivery, extended trial periods and bundled bedding.
- Better sleep: A new mattress can improve sleep quality, reduce back pain and help you wake up feeling refreshed.
What should I consider when buying a mattress online?
- Trial Period: Ensure the mattress comes with a sufficient trial period to test it out at home.
- White Glove Delivery Service: Many mattress brands offer this special delivery service that makes getting your new mattress effortless.
- Old Mattress Removal: Check if your new mattress brand offers to remove your old mattress. It might be an additional cost but it will save you so much time and effort.
- Warranty: Look for a robust warranty that covers defects and provides long-term protection.
- Customer Reviews: Read reviews from other customers to gauge the mattress's performance and quality.
- Return Policy: Check the return policy to ensure you can easily return the mattress if it doesn't meet your expectations.
How often should I replace my mattress?
It's usually recommended to replace your mattress every seven to 10 years, depending on its condition and your sleep quality. Pay attention to signs that it is time to buy a new mattress including if your sleeper is sagging or lumpy, and if you have discomfort while sleeping or wake up with aches and pains.

Is an Amazon Prime membership worth it? Here's what you need to know
Enjoy free shipping, same-day grocery delivery, exclusive deals, access to Prime Video and more.
- Amazon Prime offers free and fast shipping, exclusive deals, and access to streaming services.
- Benefits include grocery discounts, free Grubhub+, fuel savings, and access to Prime Video, Prime Gaming, and Amazon Music.
- Prime members also enjoy unlimited photo storage, early access to books, and free Audible titles.
Is an Amazon Prime membership worth it for you? Beyond the well-known fast, free delivery, a Prime membership offers a wide range of perks that can make everyday life more convenient and cost-effective. For shoppers, the value is clear. An Amazon Prime membership is arguably one of the most popular memberships because of the endless perks it comes with.
You get exclusive access to major sales events like Prime Day, and now, Amazon is expanding its grocery offerings, with a new free same-day perishable grocery delivery service for Prime members in over 1,000 cities. You can combine groceries and other household essentials in a single cart and get them delivered to your doorstep within hours.
But Prime is more than just shopping. The membership includes a host of entertainment benefits, such as Prime Video and Kindle. With so many ways to save and access exclusive services, you can only ask why a Prime membership wouldn't be worth it for you. Find out more about how much it costs and how to access exclusive Amazon sales and deals. This article will help you decide if a Prime membership is right for you.
Highlights about Amazon Prime
- How much does Amazon Prime cost?
- Does Amazon offer any discounted Prime memberships?
- What are the benefits of an Amazon Prime membership?
- What are the streaming and digital benefits included with a Prime membership?
- Is Amazon Prime worth it?
- How do I sign up for Amazon Prime?
What is Amazon Prime?
Amazon Prime is a paid membership service that offers perks like free shipping and access to exclusive deals. The popular membership can be paid monthly or annually, and users can cancel at any time within the billing window to avoid being penalized. That means there's no commitment, especially if you opt to pay month-to-month.
How much does Amazon Prime cost?
New members can try one week of Amazon Prime benefits for just $1.99. After that, Prime costs $14.99 per month or $139 per year. The annual plan will save you about $40 total compared to paying monthly.
Are there discounted Amazon Prime memberships?
Yes! Amazon has two discounted Prime membership options:
1. Amazon Prime for Young Adults (previously Prime for Students) is a new membership that is focused on perks for young adults between the ages of 18 and 24.
Eligible young adults can get a six-month Amazon Prime membership at zero cost and pay a discounted fee of $7.49 per month or $69 annually after that. This is a 50% discount compared to the full price of Amazon Prime. You no longer need to verify that you're a student for this discount, as long as your age falls between 18 and 24, you qualify for Prime for Young Adults. In order to verify your age, you will need to provide a copy of your driver's license, passport or other official documentation.
2. Prime Access: If you receive SNAP, EBT, Medicaid or other qualifying government aid, you can save with a discounted Prime Access membership.
Prime Access costs $3.50 per month for the first three months for qualifying EBT and Medicaid recipients, and $6.99 per month after that.
What are the benefits of an Amazon Prime membership?
The biggest benefit for Amazon Prime members is same-day, one-day and two-day delivery options on millions of products. The free and fast delivery perk makes shopping more convenient than ever. The newest Prime benefit will come with the launch of Alexa+, Amazon's new virtual assistant. There will be a fee of $19.99 per month to utilize the new assistant, but that fee only applies to non-Prime members. Prime members will get Alexa+ for free. Other benefits include:
- Special access to sales and lightning deals: Members get early access to select sales and timed lightning deals throughout the year, including events like Prime Day, Black Friday, Cyber Monday, Prime Big Deal Days, Amazon’s Beauty Haul and more.
- Discounts on groceries: Prime members can shop Amazon Fresh online or in-store and save 10% thanks to exclusive deals. Get unlimited free delivery on orders of $35 or more from Whole Foods Market, Amazon Fresh and local retailers for $9.99 per month.
- *Newly added* Same-day grocery delivery: Amazon is significantly expanding its free same-day grocery delivery service for Prime members, now available in over 1,000 cities and towns across the U.S. You can get fresh grocery items like produce, meat and dairy, along with non-grocery items, all in one single cart for delivery within hours. This benefit is planned to be expanded to over 2,300 locations by the end of the year. For Prime members, same-day delivery is free for orders over $25, with a small fee for smaller orders. To see if this service is available in your area you can head over to the Amazon Same-Day Store.
- Free Grubhub+: Prime members get a free Grubhub+ membership with $0 delivery fees, discounted service fees and more.
- Prime Fuel savings: Save $0.10 a gallon at more than 7,000 participating gas stations across the country.
What are the streaming and digital benefits included with a Prime membership?
- Prime Video: Prime members have access to Prime Video's extensive selection of premium content accessible across multiple devices. Users can stream and watch movies, television series, documentaries and live sports, including productions from Amazon MGM Studios; licensed popular titles; and content from partners like Max, Crunchyroll, and MGM+ via Prime Video Channels add-on subscriptions.
- Prime Gaming: Prime Gaming is a benefit included with your Amazon Prime membership that gives you access to free games, exclusive in-game content and a free monthly Twitch channel subscription. It’s like a bonus level for your Prime perks.
- Free titles at Audible: Prime members can sign up for an Audible Premium Plus trial with two free included credits that can be used on any titles.
- Prime Reading: Members get unlimited access to thousands of eBooks, magazines, comics and audiobooks, including quick reads from Amazon Original Stories.
- Amazon First Reads: Get early access to new books a month before they release. Prime members can choose one free Kindle book each month; non-Prime members pay $1.99. Titles are yours to keep.
- Amazon Music for Prime members: This included music streaming service allows members to shuffle through all music in Amazon's impressive catalog of top podcasts without advertisements.
- Amazon Music Unlimited: Offering 100 million songs on-demand and the majority of top podcasts without ads, this upgraded music streaming service provides offline listening and HD audio quality starting at $10.99 per month for Prime members.
- Prime Gaming: Prime members get complimentary games, a free Twitch channel subscription and additional gaming benefits each month at no extra cost.
- Amazon Photos: Prime members benefit from unlimited full-resolution photo storage and 5GB of video storage with Amazon Photos. You can order printed products or even personalize your Echo Show or FireTV using Amazon Photos.
Is Amazon Prime worth it?
An Amazon Prime membership gets you fast shipping, access to popular subscription services, gas discounts and thousands of deals. If you want convenient shopping perks, affordable products and exclusive discounts, an Amazon Prime membership is totally worth it.
How do I sign up for Amazon Prime?
It is so easy to sign up for an Amazon Prime membership. Visit this link and enter your information, select your preferred payment cadence (monthly or annual) and you're in! Start shopping and enjoy all the benefits!

Labor Day 2025 is on Monday, September 1. Sales typically kick off in mid-August, peak over Labor Day weekend and often extend into early September. It’s one of the biggest shopping events before Black Friday.

When is Labor Day 2025?
Labor Day always falls on the first Monday in September. This year, that's Monday, September 1, offering one last long summer weekend perfect for fun in the sun, barbecues and incredible sales!
Is Labor Day a federal holiday?
Yes, Labor Day is one of the 11 federal holidays recognized nationwide.
What stores are open on Labor Day?
Most major retailers will be open on Labor Day, with the exception of Costco, which will be closed. Additionally, most government offices, schools, banks and libraries will be closed. The United States Post Office, UPS and FedEx will also be closed. However, we always recommend you call ahead to verify store hours on holidays.

Do you qualify for a discount on an Amazon Prime membership? Find out here
Don’t overpay for Prime! Amazon offers lower costs for young adults and government benefits recipients.
- Qualifying government assistance recipients can get Prime Access for $3.50 per month for the first three months, then $6.99 monthly.
- Young adults (ages 18 to 24) qualify for a discounted Prime membership, starting at $7.49 per month.
- A full Prime membership includes benefits like free and fast shipping, Prime Video, early access to deals and more.
To unlock the best and most exclusive Amazon savings, the first step is to sign up for an Amazon Prime membership. Prime members not only gain early access to these highly anticipated deals, but they also receive special perks during all of Amazon's major sales events throughout the year, including the Big Spring Sale, Amazon's Labor Day sale and most notably, the member-exclusive Prime Day sales that take place in July and October. Beyond these limited-time events, it's hard to argue with the consistent value of discounts and the convenience of fast, free shipping offered to Prime members all year long.
If you haven't joined yet, now might be the perfect time to consider signing up, as you could qualify for a discounted membership and save on the annual fee itself. Amazon has also re-launched its Prime for Young Adults membership, a discounted offer designed to help people between the ages of 18 and 24 take advantage of all the perks of Prime at a lower price.
Whether you're a young adult or receiving government assistance, you could qualify for a discounted Prime membership and save on year-round perks, plus the annual membership fee itself! Below, we've highlighted everything you need to know.
Learn more about discounted Amazon Prime memberships:
- What is a Young Adults Prime membership (previously Prime for Students)
- How much does Amazon Prime for Young Adults cost?
- What is Prime Access for government assistance recipients?
- How much does Prime Access for government assistance recipients cost?
- Does Amazon Prime offer a military discount?
What is the student discount on Prime memberships?
Amazon Prime for Young Adults (previously Prime for Students) is a new membership that is focused on perks for young adults between the ages of 18 and 24. The following perks are included with a Prime for Young Adults membership:
- Prime Delivery
- Prime Video
- Early access to deals
- Amazon Music
- Prime Fuel savings
- Prime Reading
- Amazon Warehouse
- Prime exclusives
- Amazon Photos
- Prime Gaming
- NEW: Get 5% cash back on beauty, apparel, electronics and personal care
How much does Amazon Prime for Young Adults cost?
Eligible young adults can get a six-month Amazon Prime membership at zero cost and pay a discounted fee of $7.49 per month or $69 annually after that. This is a 50% discount compared to the full price of Amazon Prime. You no longer need to verify that you're a student for this discount, as long as your age falls between 18 and 24, you qualify for Prime for Young Adults. In order to verify your age, you will need to provide a copy of your driver's license, passport or other official documentation.
What is Prime Access for government assistance recipients?
If you receive SNAP, EBT, Medicaid or other qualifying government aid, you can save with a discounted Prime Access membership.
How much does Prime Access for government assistance recipients cost?
Prime Access costs $3.50 per month for the first three months for qualifying EBT and Medicaid recipients, and $6.99 per month after that.
How do you prove you qualify for an Amazon Prime membership discount with government assistance?
Upload a photo of your EBT card or eligibility letter to prove you qualify for an Amazon Prime membership discount with government assistance. From there, enter a payment method to use after your free 30-day trial ends. You will be billed on a month-to-month basis after the trial.
You must verify your status every 12 months. The discount can be received for up to four years from the initial sign-up date. Amazon will send an email whenever it is time to verify your credentials to ensure you continue to qualify for the discount.
What government assistance programs qualify for the Prime Access discount?
There are a number of programs that may qualify you for a Prime Access discounted membership. Here's a full list of documentation that may be provided:
- Supplemental Security Income (this is different from Social Security and SSDI)
- SNAP
- Medicaid
- Direct Express Debit Card (DE)
- Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF)
- National School Lunch Program (NSLP)
- Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program (LIHEAP)
- Women, Infants, and Children program (WIC)
- Tribal assistance eligibility letter (TTANF),
- Puerto Rico's Nutrition Assistance Program (NAP)
Does Amazon Prime offer a military discount?
No. Unfortunately, Amazon does not offer a general military or veteran discount program for Prime membership. In the past, Amazon has occasionally offered one around Veterans Day, but it has not been consistent. If one does go live this year, we will be sure to keep you updated on it at USA Today Shopping.

Shop Pottery Barn's new Halloween Shop and save up to 50% now 🎃
Save on porch decor, Wednesday-themed mugs and even cute jack-o'-lanterns!
Those of us who have been eagerly anticipating spooky season and the crisp fall weather that comes along with it can now rejoice. Labor Day weekend unofficially marks the end of summer, so you can get ready to dust off your ghoulish decor and take your flannels out of storage as you sip on a delicious pumpkin spice latte from Starbucks!
Even better, Pottery Barn's newly released Halloween Shop is offering some deep discounts of up to 50% off their chic Halloween table decor, porch decorations and spooky-good entertaining pieces.
We even spotted some hauntingly adorable Wednesday Adams-themed items on sale!
You won't want to miss this chance to get your home perfectly set up for the season. Ahead, you can find some of our favorite picks. Be sure to grab them now while they're on sale!
Save up to 50% on Pottery Barn's Halloween Shop
Save up to 50% at Pottery Barn's Halloween Shop
When is the first day of fall?
Who cares? As soon as Labor Day is behind us, it is basically fall. But in reality, the first day of fall is Monday, September 22. It marks the autumnal equinox, when day and night are nearly equal in length.
When is Halloween 2025?
Halloween 2025 falls on Friday, October 31.
